death.attack.dungeonsdelight.ancient_egg: %2$s 把 %1$s 轉換成了一坨伏聆爛泥
death.attack.dungeonsdelight.bloody_mary: %2$s 見證了 %1$s 把自己怪物化了
death.attack.dungeonsdelight.shatter.pla: %2$s 用瓶子砸碎了 %1$s 的頭部
death.attack.dungeonsdelight.skull_heart: %1$s 被巨大的爆炸熱能熔化了
%1$s 被 %2$s 的爆炸熱能融化了
dungeonsdelight.advancement.all_knife_mo: 獲得所有特殊怪物掉落物
dungeonsdelight.advancement.all_monster_: 同時獲得所有怪物效果，現在誰是怪物？
吃掉所有怪物佳餚與飲品。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_biteable: 有嚼勁的食物可以食用多次，並可用特殊物品來補充。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_bloody_m: 喝下血腥瑪麗怪物酒，然後看你後面。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_ghastly_: 喝下一瓶幽幽酒，然後起飛。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_horse.de: 在擁有暴食效果下吃下一整匹馬。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_monster_: 把一堆怪物內臟煮成一坨ㄆㄨㄣ。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_sculk_fo: 伏聆食品會根據伏聆佔食物的多寡來給予經驗。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.eat_sniffer_: 吃掉用嗅探獸做成的食物。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.get_candied_: 使用紫水晶棒棒糖來囚禁惱鬼或蠹魚。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.get_netherit: 使用獄髓錠升級您的鑽石菜刀。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.get_sculk_po: 將伏聆及其延伸物切成伏聆息肉。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.get_slime_no: 有點可怕的麵，而且還在蠕動...。獲得生史萊姆麵。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_burro: 用蠹魚製作的食物允許您在破壞方塊時回復您的飢餓值，但會取代挖掘加速效果。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_decis: 在主副手持有怪物食品攻擊有概率造成1.75倍的傷害，取代力量效果。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_exuda: 吃掉腐化食品可以在效果期間將您造成的傷害轉化為預生命值，受傷時就會使用預生命值回復血量，取代吸收效果。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_perce: 發光的食品可以讓玩家看見牆後的實體。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_pounc: 蜘蛛食品允許你像蜘蛛一樣地爬牆，取代跳躍提升效果。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_tenac: 吃下一些怪物菜餚可以讓您根據飢餓值得高底與回復速度成正比，取代療癒效果。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.obtain_vorac: 吃下一些怪物菜餚允許您活吃怪物，取代滋補效果。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.place_dungeo: 放置一個牢亡爐灶，可以加熱怪物烹飪鍋。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.place_embedd: 將蛋混入伏聆中，然後透過某些手段使他變快。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.place_monste: 放置怪物烹飪鍋並準備怪物食材！
向敵人丟去一把菜刀並拾取其掉落的特殊食材。
dungeonsdelight.advancement.use_rancid_r: 使用腐臭精華來腐化作物。
dungeonsdelight.jei.sculking.accelerator: 放在四周能夠加速分解的方塊（詳見以下）
dungeonsdelight.jei.sculking.night: 只能在月光下伏聆化並加速分解
dungeonsdelight.jei.sculking.spawner: 能夠被相鄰的生怪磚加熱並加速分解
dungeonsdelight.skull_heart_blast: %1$s 被巨大的爆炸熱能熔化了
effect.dungeonsdelight.burrow_gut.descri: 消耗挖掘加速，只能食用怪物食品，但破壞方塊時會依其硬度回復飢餓值，有機率獲得「貪婪衝刺」，根據持續時間提升破壞速度。
effect.dungeonsdelight.decisive.descript: 消耗力量，有機率對敵人造成爆擊，造成原始傷害的 1.5 倍。
effect.dungeonsdelight.exudation.descrip: 消耗吸收，所有吸收增加的生命值會轉化為『吃苦當補』版本，承受 1.25 倍傷害，並在受傷時引發爆炸。
effect.dungeonsdelight.feral_bite.descri: 使用此效果可對目標施加「死毅」效果。
effect.dungeonsdelight.pouncing.descript: 消耗跳躍提升，使使用者在潛行時能攀爬方塊，並每級增加 5% 移動速度。
effect.dungeonsdelight.ravenous_rush.des: 提升移動與攻擊速度，並根據其他當前效果獲得額外增益。
effect.dungeonsdelight.serrated.descript: 緩慢地持續受到無視防禦的傷害。
effect.dungeonsdelight.tenacity.descript: 消耗療癒，根據飢餓程度提升回復速度（越餓回得越快）。
effect.dungeonsdelight.voracity.descript: 消耗滋補，只能食用怪物食品，但攻擊生物時會將其吞噬。完全吞噬後會短暫獲得「貪婪衝刺」。
enchantment.dungeonsdelight.ricochet.des: Thrown cleavers now bounce and don't have a cooldown upon missing an entity, each bounce increases the damage by 1.1x.
enchantment.dungeonsdelight.serrated_str: Cleavers inflict serrated onto struck entities causing protection bypassing damage.
farmersdelight.jei.info.candied_silverfi: 用紫水晶棒棒糖攻擊蠹魚以取得。
farmersdelight.jei.info.candied_vex: 用紫水晶棒棒糖攻擊惱鬼以取得。
farmersdelight.jei.info.cleaver: 菜刀是小型的遠程與近戰武器。它們可以從草中收集稻梗，並保證掉落實體的次要掉落物。
farmersdelight.jei.info.rancid_reduction: 可投擲以對實體施加虛弱與吃苦當補效果，並使成熟作物腐化。
farmersdelight.jei.info.rock_candy: 可用來攻擊生物並將其封印在糖中。
farmersdelight.jei.info.stained_scrap: 打破一個生怪磚以獲取
farmersdelight.tooltip.arcane_chili: 可重複食用，會賦予隨機效果
farmersdelight.tooltip.average_xp_poison: 提供些許經驗值並解毒
farmersdelight.tooltip.bloody_mary: 將一個效果怪物化……但要付出代價
farmersdelight.tooltip.bubblegunk: 可反覆咀嚼，會使使用者感到飢餓
farmersdelight.tooltip.chance_to_not_con: 有機率食用時不會消耗
farmersdelight.tooltip.large_xp_poison_p: 提供大量經驗值並解毒
farmersdelight.tooltip.monster_burger: 每一項罪惡、疾病與垃圾食物，全夾在這裡...
farmersdelight.tooltip.small_xp_poison_p: 提供少量經驗值並解毒
farmersdelight.tooltip.undead: 若無怪物效果時，將一個效果怪物化
farmersdelight.tooltip.wip: 警告！此物品尚未完成，未來可能會變更...
item.dungeonsdelight.monster_yam_spawn_e: 腐芋共生體 生怪蛋
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.c: A stained scrap block that has been cut into tiles
Metallic slabs constructed from stained scrap
Metallic stairs constructed from stained scrap
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.d: A stove powered by the energy of life that of which can be exploited for some tasty delights
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.e: Not truly dead, because it is never truly born. A perfect catalyst for flavor
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.g: A lantern just isn’t sweet enough
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.h: Souls in stasis or souls unrestrained? What would happen if you had a taste?
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.m: Sad the monsters aren't around for their own party
A mysterious cooking utensil that uses the heat of monster spawners to cook delicacies
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.p: A crate filled to the brim with poisonous potatoes
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.r: A crate filled to the brim with rotbulbs
A crate filled to the brim with rotten tomatoes
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.s: A cubic meter of solid mayonnaise
Metal bars constructed from stained scrap
A metal block constructed from a collection of stained scrap
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.w: It feels like its tasting you as you grasp it in your hand
Can be pushed by players, arrows, and tridents, stays pushed for longer the darker it is
Place your food in a cool, damp, dark place where no one can find it
When a house is both hungry and awake, every room becomes a mouth
When a house is both hungry and awake, every room becomes a mouth...
To keep THEM out or to keep you in...
Can be opened, but who would want to do that...
Peculiar planks that have been finely chiseled
Insidious slabs constructed from wormwood mosaic
Sinister stairs constructed from wormwood mosaic
Produces a redstone signal when ANY entity makes contact with it but is pressed down longer the darker it is
This sinister smirk seems to be beckoning you into a trap
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.an: When sculk converts a life that is yet to die, an unimaginable delicacy
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.ar: "There is no prize to perfection. Only an end to pursuit."
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.au: A flower pot full of... a foul stench, yuck
The ice cream faintly glows in differing colors
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.bl: So hot it almost was given fire resistance II
Bloated to the brim with rich (and mostly disgusting) ingredients
"You swear you saw a silhouette in the reflection of the glass..."
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.br: Gelatinous hunk of meat that slips effortlessly through your fingers
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.bu: I have come to chew bubblegunk and kick cubes. And I'm all out of bubblegunk.
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.cl: An ancient egg pierced of it’s leathery skin
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.co: Careful it will dissolve in water!
The cooked leg of a once joyful creature
A searing piece of delicious meat
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.cr: A crunchy leaf-like plant filled with gunpowder, be careful with how you cut
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.de: A sinister combination of the weirdest smelling egg and the weirdest smelling condiment
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.di: A shimmering diamond blade, time to slice and dice!
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.fl: A crude flint blade, time to slice and dice!
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.fr: Fried bug ready for the tasting
A fried snack to enjoy on a journey
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.ge: Not really a soup, not really a salad but something all it’s own
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.gh: If it weren't for the ring shape it would slip out your hands!
A delicious mixture of ghast and rotbulb
Hope you don't mind the slimy texture!
The spirits of the sand are free... or just to get caught up in a bottle
The most approachable of monster meals
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.gl: A sweet squishy dish that illuminates your insides
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.go: A hasty golden blade, time to slice and dice!
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.gr: A refined palate can tell where husk flesh comes from just by the natural seasoning
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.gu: All that effort decorating your dish just to smash it onto a plate
Gel in the shape of a guardian... so like... a guardian angel?
The purest form of disgust localized within a clump in your hands
An arrow that has been blunted by gunk, the foul spell attracts the undead
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.gy: A challenging meal of grease and protein
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.hy: An extremely spicy dish filled with dragon meat
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.ir: A strong iron blade, time to slice and dice!
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.li: Bet it tastes good with ice cream!
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.ma: Bugs and plants rolled up into a treat!
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.me: Is it a sandwich filled with monster meat or minotaur beef?
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.mo: This crop won't let you harvest it so easily...
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.ne: A durable netherite blade, time to slice and dice!
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.om: A peculiar tingling filling wrapped within a shroud of savory eggs
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.po: No one will be a bigger hater than Yirmiri
A poisonous mess of rotten and disgusting ingredients
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.ra: A little bottle of monster rot
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.ro: Like biting into a sack of fetid wax
Rotten flesh that has been trimmed of the most unsafe spots
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.sa: The flesh seems to have melted into the broth itself
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.sc: Once a large dangerous snake, now a creamy mix of rice and Naga meat
An apple that has been candied in sculk
A cacophony of rotten eggs and spoiled grapes
It is still filled with a little experience...
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.sh: A dish filled with the visceral insides of monsters
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.si: Life and death, sweet and sour...
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.sl: Sticky slime that has been congealed into a malleable block
Slippery noodles that almost snake and move on their own
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.sm: Vague hint of acidity, slight hint of crab, and a big chunk of charcoal
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.sn: Only a monster would cut the leg off such a joyful creature
A raw piece of meat that can regenerate anything but itself
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.so: Wet flesh hangs flimsily onto the bone
Well, I guess the egg comes first
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.sp: The least poisonous parts of the spider
When you want your spider guts on the go!
You feel an evil presence watching you...
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.sw: A sweet snack for an adventurer's journey
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.ta: The milk and sugar seems to cancel out the spoiled rot
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.te: A horde of every rotten beast congealed into a flavour of unimaginable complexity
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.to: A soft dish filled with some mushy sculk
A burrito filled with the tower's tasty monsters
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.wa: A block of vile smelling cheese that tastes faintly of raisins
The sculk seems to grow just as new parts are exposed to air
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.wi: A tasty sandwich filled with the immediate wildlife
enchantment.dungeonsdelight.life_grasp.d: 罪惡刀與菜刀能更快充能其熱量計。
菜刀投擲時傷害較低，但會賦予目標緩速效果，且命中方塊後可撿回並重置冷卻。
enchantment.dungeonsdelight.retraction.d: 菜刀可將擊中的目標或物品拉向投擲者。
farmersdelight.tooltip.monster_burger_fo: 將所有效果轉換為對應的怪物效果
farmersdelight.tooltip.spider_bubble_tea: 隨機強化一種 I 級效果，但持續時間減半
若無其他一級效果，獲得爬牆 II（02:00）
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.l: A station used to cook up to 4 foods slowly
Life essence keeps the flame ablaze
Life essence keeps the flame ablaze
Life essence keeps the flame ablaze
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.r: All the life energy has been consumed into a new life...
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.s: Metal chains constructed from stained scrap
A metallic grate constructed from stained scrap that allows items to pass through it, great!
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.ch: A tasty salad full of slimy noodles
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.si: Emergency protein that’s rich with minerals!
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.sp: A violent mixture of various spider guts
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.st: A stained blade prepared for stealing life essence, time to slice and dice!
A stained blade prepared for stealing life essence, time to slice and dice!
A cold slice of metal that has the ability to bring together life
dungeonsdelight.advancement.get_stained_: 取得使用罪惡碎片製成的工具
yapping_tooltips.block.dungeonsdelight.o: Who would think after your fate you'd become a serving dish
yapping_tooltips.item.dungeonsdelight.os: Be careful not to eat the bones... unless you want to.
